P

penaltyPick(Card) - Method in class GameLaunch
whenever we use RandomPick4card or RandomPick2Card this method is used and gives a mixture of these two cards to next player or let him to give a "7 card"
pickCard() - Method in class GameLaunch
 
pickCheck - Variable in class GameLaunch
this boolean is used for increasing punishment of players whenever they must receive some of RandomPick4card and RandomPick2Card.
pickNumberX2 - Variable in class GameLaunch
this field determines the punishment of a player whenever his previous player gives a RandomPick2Card its default amount must be zero and whenever a player uses RandomPick2Card, 1 number advances and whenever player gets his random cards it will be zero again
pickNumberX4 - Variable in class GameLaunch
this field determines the punishment of a player whenever his previous player gives a RandomPick4card its default amount must be zero and whenever a player uses RandomPick4card, 1 number advances and whenever player gets his random cards it will be zero again
pickRandomCard() - Method in class GameLaunch
 
Player - Class in <Unnamed>

initializes Player.playerCards arraylist and Player.wholeScore
playerCards - Variable in class Player
saves all cards of a player has
playerMode - Variable in class GameLaunch
1 for playing with humans and -1 for playing with bots
players - Variable in class GameLaunch
arraylist of players
playTurn(int) - Method in class GameLaunch

pressAnyKeyToContinue() - Static method in class Main

printOtherPlayersCardsNumber() - Method in class GameLaunch
prints number of cards of players except the person who is playing
printPlayerCards(Player) - Static method in class PrintCards

printRanks() - Method in class GameLaunch
this method uses bubble sort to show rank of players used bubble sort in this methodbubble list URL reference rank #1 has the lowest card score
